DOC.brief_summary: Evaluated whether HA coat dynamic hip screw improve surgical result trochanteric femoral fracture
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation HA Coated Dynamic Hip Screws Trochanteric Femoral Fractures
DOC.detailed_description: Randomised study determine effect HA coating stability lag screw use reduce femoral neck fracture . Stability screw determine RSA measurement . The effect HA coat bone remodeling determine DEXA measurement
